panels.description: Display of actual temperature in Padua.

defaults.noValue: No data in the specified interval

targets.rawSql: SELECT gather_time as time, readings as " ", sensor_name FROM "sc_database"."temperature" WHERE ( time >= $__fromTime AND time <= $__toTime AND sensor_name IN (${temperature_sensor:singlequote})) ORDER BY time ASC

panels.title: Temperature in Padua, Italy

panels.description: Display of statistics about actual temperature in Padua.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT t6.sensor_name as Sensor, a as Average, mean as Mean, m as "Min", mx as "Max"
FROM
(SELECT t4.sensor_name, AVG(t4.readings) as mean
FROM 
(SELECT t2.sensor_name, t3.readings, t3.c
FROM
(SELECT t1.sensor_name, MAX(t1.c) as c from 
(SELECT t.sensor_name, t.readings, COUNT(t.sensor_name) as c from (select sensor_name, readings, gather_time as time from temperature WHERE ( time >= $__fromTime AND time <= $__toTime ) ORDER BY time desc) t group by t.sensor_name, t.readings) t1
group by sensor_name ) t2
LEFT JOIN
(SELECT t.sensor_name, t.readings, COUNT(t.sensor_name) as c from (select sensor_name, readings, gather_time as time from temperature WHERE ( time >= $__fromTime AND time <= $__toTime ) ORDER BY time desc) t group by t.sensor_name, t.readings) t3
ON t2.sensor_name = t3.sensor_name AND t3.c = t2.c ) t4
group by t4.sensor_name) t5
LEFT JOIN
(SELECT t.sensor_name, AVG(t.readings) as a, MIN(readings) as m, MAX(readings) as mx FROM (select sensor_name, readings, gather_time as time from temperature WHERE ( time >= $__fromTime AND time <= $__toTime ) ORDER BY time desc) t group by t.sensor_name) t6
ON t5.sensor_name = t6.sensor_name

panels.title: Temperature Statistics in Padua, Italy

panels.description: Display of average temperature in Padua.

defaults.noValue: No data in the specified interval

targets.rawSql:
SELECT AVG(t1.readings)
FROM 
(SELECT readings from temperature
WHERE (gather_time >= $__fromTime AND gather_time <= $__toTime)
AND gather_time in (select max(gather_time) from temperature group by sensor_name)) t1

panels.title: Average Temperature in Padua, Italy

panels.description: Display of actual temperature vs heat index (apparent temperature).

defaults.noValue: No data in the specified interval

targets.rawSql: SELECT gather_time as "time", sensor_name, readings as " " FROM "sc_database"."heat_index" WHERE ( time >= $__fromTime AND time <= $__toTime ) AND sensor_name IN (${temperature_sensor:singlequote}) ORDER BY time ASC

panels.title: Heat Index in Padua, Italy

panels.description: Display of statistics about apparent temperature in Padua.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT sensor_name as Sensor, AVG(readings) as "Average", MAX(readings) as "Max", MIN(readings) as "Min"
FROM sc_database.heat_index
WHERE ( gather_time >= $__fromTime AND gather_time <= $__toTime )
GROUP by sensor_name

panels.title: Heat Index Statistics in Padua, Italy

panels.description: Display of average apparent temperature in Padua.

defaults.noValue: No data in the specified interval

targets.rawSql:
SELECT AVG(readings)
FROM 
(SELECT readings from heat_index
WHERE (gather_time >= $__fromTime AND gather_time <= $__toTime)
AND gather_time in (select max(gather_time) from heat_index group by sensor_name))t1

panels.title: Average Heat Index in Padua, Italy

targets.rawSql:

targets.rawSql: SELECT gather_time as time, readings as " ", sensor_name FROM "sc_database"."precipitation_intensity" WHERE ( time >= $__fromTime AND time <= $__toTime AND sensor_name IN (${precipitation_intensity_sensor:singlequote})) ORDER BY time ASC

panels.title: Precipitation Intensity in Padua, Italy

panels.description: Displays of average precipitations on Padua.

defaults.noValue: No data in the specified interval

targets.rawSql:
SELECT AVG(pi1.readings)
FROM 
(SELECT readings from precipitation_intensity
WHERE (gather_time >= $__fromTime AND gather_time <= $__toTime)
AND gather_time in (select max(gather_time) from precipitation_intensity group by sensor_name)) pi1

panels.title: Average Precipitation Intensity in Padua, Italy

panels.description: Display of air pollution in Padua.

targets.rawSql: SELECT gather_time as time, sensor_name, PM2_5 as "PM 2.5", PM10 as "PM 10", O3, NO2 FROM "sc_database"."air_pollution" WHERE ( time >= $__fromTime AND time <= $__toTime ) AND sensor_name IN (${air_pollution_sensor:singlequote}) ORDER BY time ASC

panels.title: Air Pollution in Padua, Italy

panels.description: Display of PM 2.5 level in Padua.

targets.rawSql: SELECT gather_time as time, sensor_name, PM2_5 as " " FROM "sc_database"."air_pollution" WHERE ( time >= $__fromTime AND time <= $__toTime ) AND sensor_name IN (${air_pollution_sensor:singlequote}) ORDER BY time ASC

panels.title: PM 2.5 Level

panels.description: Displays the average concentration of pm 2,5 particles suspended in air in Padua.

targets.rawSql: SELECT AVG(ap1.PM2_5) FROM (SELECT PM2_5 FROM air_pollution WHERE (gather_time >=$__fromTime AND gather_time <= $__toTime) AND gather_time IN (SELECT max(gather_time) FROM air_pollution group by sensor_name)) ap1
